title: Activity-Based Digital Logic Design Online Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of electrical engineering and binary number systems
context.additional_context: Practical skill-centered design for workplace learners, applicable to job tasks

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more combinational logic circuits by applying Boolean algebra.
Learners can implement a simulation model of flip-flop-based sequential circuits using Verilog HDL.
Learners can analyze timing issues in digital system design and propose optimization strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
